iOS App Design

The Project

The following work samples represent both an iPhone and iPad mockup for a restaurant table managing app.

The goal of this app is to manage and assign certain values for individual tables on a restuarant floor.

Tables can be marked as Available, Unavailable, Seated etc. This app is meant to be used with the Rezku POS System (not shown). Visit rezku.com to view.
